hymn.title: Rise! Preach the gospel now
hymn.category: Preaching of the Gospel—Rescuing the Perishing

layout.singingstanza: Rise! Preach the gos -- pel now! Res -- cue the fall -- en! Lo, mil -- lions per -- ish -- ing dai -- ly in pain! Quench not your heart of love, Count not pos -- ses -- sions: Rise! Preach the gos -- pel while mo -- ments re -- main. Rise! Preach the gos -- pel now! Res -- cue the fall -- en! Your heart of love for them, Can you res -- train?

lyrics.stanza: Rise! Preach the gospel now! Rescue the fallen! Lo, millions perishing daily in pain! Quench not your heart of love, Count not possessions: Rise! Preach the gospel while moments remain.
Rise! Preach the gospel now! Rescue the fallen! Your heart of love for them, Can you restrain?
